channel.title: CVE Feed for cmoreira -- Interactive World Maps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cmoreira -- Interactive World Maps

item.title: CVE-2024-3681|2024-05-02T16:57:17.296Z -- cmoreira -- Interactive World Maps
item.description: The Interactive World Maps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the search (s) parameter in all versions up to, and including, 2.4.14 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
